name: The Killer Cylinder
description:
In this game you play as a cylinder and spawned in a mysterious world of cubes. To escape from this mysterious world you have to kill all the cubes possible and their boss too and find that Big Brain (Bada Dimaag) to Think Big (Bada Soch) to make a escape plan, be careful as if you touch them then you will die instantly.  

Your phone must support Gyroscope to play this game :)

#HardestGame XD
